## WchPlaceholder interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WchPlaceholder 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [accessor$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.accessor_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;string&gt;</code> | The accessor expression |
|  [data$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.data_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | Generates the accessed data, decoded from the accessor expression |
|  [formattedText$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.formattedtext_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;LocalizedText&gt;</code> | Generates the formatted text of an element, potentially replaced by the placeholder |
|  [placeholder$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.placeholder_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;AuthoringPlaceholder&gt;</code> | Event exposing the current placeholder. If no placeholder exists or placeholders are disabled, this will return 'undefined'. |
|  [placeholderText$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.placeholdertext_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;LocalizedText&gt;</code> | Event exposing the current placeholder text. If placeholders are disabled, this will return 'undefined'. If no placeholder has been defined this returns the default placeholder as specified by the application, else 'undefined'. |
|  [plainText$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.plaintext_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;LocalizedText&gt;</code> | Generates the text of an element, potentially replaced by the placeholder |
|  [showPlaceholder$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.showplaceholder_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | Checks if we should show or hide placeholders |
|  [typeId$](./ng-edit-api.wchplaceholder.typeid_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;string&gt;</code> | Decodes the type of the currently accessed element |
